Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows Joe Biden on a plane without a mask during the COVID-19 pandemic, when in fact the photograph was taken in November 2019, before the pandemic.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph was taken before the COVID-19 pandemic and before face masks were widely recommended.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or context to support the assertion that Joe Biden was not wearing a mask during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the photograph is recent and relevant to the COVID-19 pandemic, when it is actually from 2019.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photograph is outdated and does not reflect Biden's behavior during the COVID-19 pandemic.
